SEARCH
Package com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api

Klasse HandlerInfo

java.lang.Object
com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.HandlerInfo
public class HandlerInfo extends Object
Describes a discovered handler class annotated with Function.

This class is used internally during annotation processing and generation to hold metadata about each function implementation, including handler location, input/output types, function configuration, and build artifact metadata.

It is passed into template processing or custom generators to drive generation logic.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • HandlerInfo

      public HandlerInfo(String functionId, int memory, int timeout, int minInstances, String handlerClassName, String handlerFullyQualifiedName, String handlerPackage, String handlerMethod, String inputType, String outputType, String artifactId, String version, String classifier, String targetDir)
      Constructs a new HandlerInfo with the required properties.
      Parameter:
      functionId - unique identifier of the function
      memory - memory limit in MB
      timeout - timeout in seconds
      minInstances - minimum instances (e.g., warm start)
      handlerClassName - simple name of the handler class
      handlerFullyQualifiedName - fully qualified name of the handler class
      handlerPackage - package name of the handler class
      handlerMethod - method name implementing the handler
      inputType - input type (possibly generic)
      outputType - output type (possibly generic)
      artifactId - Maven artifactId of the module
      version - Maven version of the module
      classifier - optional classifier
      targetDir - build output directory

    • setWrapperClassName

      public void setWrapperClassName(String wrapperFullyQualifiedName)
      Sets the fully qualified name of the generated wrapper class. Typically used by generators when wrapping the handler for runtime platforms.
      Parameter:
      wrapperFullyQualifiedName - name to assign
